Description: The knob, made with a protective cover, has dramatically improve level of this high quality and reliable watch. The inner lid, axis and inner case are made with a ferrite material that protects them from corrosion. It gives accurate time even during extreme temperature change between -40C ~ 60C. The strength and beauty of this watch makes it an excellent choice. [Specifications] Face: Sapphire Crystal Display Type: Analog Case Diameter/Length: 42 mm Case Width: 13mm Band Material: Stainless Steel Bracelet Band Length: apprx. 15~21 cm Band Color: Silver Index Color: Black Calendar: Date Display Weight: 222g Movement: Automatic Water Resistance: up to 300 m 1 year warranty by Time Japan. Ship from Japan by japan Post EMS, and it will take 4-7 days for you to receive it.
Title: Ball Watch Automatic Engineer Hydrocarbon Ceramic XV DM2136A-SCJ-BK
